bibl.title: Greek Magical Amulets. The Inscribed Gold, Silver, Copper, and Bronze Lamellae. Part I: Published Texts of Known Provenance. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XXII, 1.)
bibl.note: Contains only those previously published texts whose provenances are known. Published materials of unknown provenance, as well as unpublished pieces are reserved for a subsequent volume.

KOTANSKY Roy (Text and Commentary by), Greek Magical Amulets. The Inscribed Gold, Silver, Copper, and Bronze Lamellae. Part I: Published Texts of Known Provenance. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XXII, 1.)
